scripts.dev: export $(cat .env | xargs) && docker-compose up -d postgres && concurrently "pnpm backend:dev" "pnpm frontend:dev"
scripts.backend:dev: cd backend && export $(cat ../.env | xargs) && bun run dev
scripts.frontend:dev: cd frontend && export $(cat ../.env | xargs) && npx shadow-cljs watch app
scripts.build: cd frontend && export $(cat ../.env | xargs) && npx shadow-cljs release app
